title: N
data:
==Commands==
*Pressing '''n''' will [[movement | move]] your character one square down and right.
*Pressing '''shift+n''' will move you in this direction until you encounter a [[monster]] or something else interesting

==Symbols==
While playing in console mode:
*'''n''' represents a [[Undead#Ghouls|ghoul]]-type monster.
*'''N''' represents a [[List of nagas | naga]]-type monster.
